                              <div class="line">Come, come, we fear the worst; all shall be well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">When clouds appear, wise men put on their cloaks;</div>
                              <div class="line">When great leaves fall, the winter is at hand;</div>
                              <div class="line">When the sun sets, who doth not look for night?</div>
                              <div class="line">Untimely storms make men expect a dearth.</div>
                              <div class="line">All may be well; but, if God sort it so,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis more than we deserve, or I expect.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, the souls of men are full of dread:</div>
                              <div class="line">Ye cannot reason almost with a man</div>
                              <div class="line">That looks not heavily and full of fear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">Before the times of change, still is it so:</div>
                              <div class="line">By a divine instinct men's minds mistrust</div>
                              <div class="line">Ensuing dangers; as by proof, we see</div>
                              <div class="line">The waters swell before a boisterous storm.</div>
                              <div class="line">But leave it all to God. whither away?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, we were sent for to the justices.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">And so was I: I'll bear you company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  London. The palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter the ARCHBISHOP OF YORK, young YORK, QUEEN
ELIZABETH, and the DUCHESS OF YORK</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARCHBISHOP OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Last night, I hear, they lay at Northampton;</div>
                              <div class="line">At Stony-Stratford will they be to-night:</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow, or next day, they will be here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I long with all my heart to see the prince:</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope he is much grown since last I saw him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">But I hear, no; they say my son of York</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath almost overta'en him in his growth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, mother; but I would not have it so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, my young cousin, it is good to grow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Grandam, one night, as we did sit at supper,</div>
                              <div class="line">My uncle Rivers talk'd how I did grow</div>
                              <div class="line">More than my brother: 'Ay,' quoth my uncle</div>
                              <div class="line">Gloucester,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Small herbs have grace, great weeds do grow apace:'</div>
                              <div class="line">And since, methinks, I would not grow so fast,</div>
                              <div class="line">Because sweet flowers are slow and weeds make haste.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Good faith, good faith, the saying did not hold</div>
                              <div class="line">In him that did object the same to thee;</div>
                              <div class="line">He was the wretched'st thing when he was young,</div>
                              <div class="line">So long a-growing and so leisurely,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, if this rule were true, he should be gracious.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARCHBISHOP OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, madam, so, no doubt, he is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope he is; but yet let mothers doubt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, by my troth, if I had been remember'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">I could have given my uncle's grace a flout,</div>
                              <div class="line">To touch his growth nearer than he touch'd mine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">How, my pretty York? I pray thee, let me hear it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, they say my uncle grew so fast</div>
                              <div class="line">That he could gnaw a crust at two hours old</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas full two years ere I could get a tooth.</div>
                              <div class="line">Grandam, this would have been a biting jest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray thee, pretty York, who told thee this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Grandam, his nurse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">His nurse! why, she was dead ere thou wert born.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">If 'twere not she, I cannot tell who told me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">A parlous boy: go to, you are too shrewd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARCHBISHOP OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Good madam, be not angry with the child.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Pitchers have ears.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARCHBISHOP OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes a messenger. What news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Such news, my lord, as grieves me to unfold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">How fares the prince?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, madam, and in health.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">What is thy news then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Rivers and Lord Grey are sent to Pomfret,</div>
                              <div class="line">With them Sir Thomas Vaughan, prisoners.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Who hath committed them?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">The mighty dukes</div>
                              <div class="line">Gloucester and Buckingham.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">For what offence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">The sum of all I can, I have disclosed;</div>
                              <div class="line">Why or for what these nobles were committed</div>
                              <div class="line">Is all unknown to me, my gracious lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay me, I see the downfall of our house!</div>
                              <div class="line">The tiger now hath seized the gentle hind;</div>
                              <div class="line">Insulting tyranny begins to jet</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the innocent and aweless throne:</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, destruction, death, and massacre!</div>
                              <div class="line">I see, as in a map, the end of all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Accursed and unquiet wrangling days,</div>
                              <div class="line">How many of you have mine eyes beheld!</div>
                              <div class="line">My husband lost his life to get the crown;</div>
                              <div class="line">And often up and down my sons were toss'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">For me to joy and weep their gain and loss:</div>
                              <div class="line">And being seated, and domestic broils</div>
                              <div class="line">Clean over-blown, themselves, the conquerors.</div>
                              <div class="line">Make war upon themselves; blood against blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Self against self: O, preposterous</div>
                              <div class="line">And frantic outrage, end thy damned spleen;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or let me die, to look on death no more!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, my boy; we will to sanctuary.</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll go along with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">You have no cause.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARCHBISHOP OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">My gracious lady, go;</div>
                              <div class="line">And thither bear your treasure and your goods.</div>
                              <div class="line">For my part, I'll resign unto your grace</div>
                              <div class="line">The seal I keep: and so betide to me</div>
                              <div class="line">As well I tender you and all of yours!</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, I'll conduct you to the sanctuary.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  London. A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  Before Lord Hastings' house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  Pomfret Castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE IV.  The Tower of London.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.6">5. SCENE V.  The Tower-walls.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.7">6. SCENE VI.  The same.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.8">7. SCENE VII.  Baynard's Castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  London. A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>The trumpets sound. Enter the young PRINCE EDWARD,
GLOUCESTER, BUCKINGHAM, CARDINAL, CATESBY, and others</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, sweet prince, to London, to your chamber.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, dear cousin, my thoughts' sovereign</div>
                              <div class="line">The weary way hath made you melancholy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">No, uncle; but our crosses on the way</div>
                              <div class="line">Have made it tedious, wearisome, and heavy</div>
                              <div class="line">I want more uncles here to welcome me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet prince, the untainted virtue of your years</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath not yet dived into the world's deceit</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor more can you distinguish of a man</div>
                              <div class="line">Than of his outward show; which, God he knows,</div>
                              <div class="line">Seldom or never jumpeth with the heart.</div>
                              <div class="line">Those uncles which you want were dangerous;</div>
                              <div class="line">Your grace attended to their sugar'd words,</div>
                              <div class="line">But look'd not on the poison of their hearts :</div>
                              <div class="line">God keep you from them, and from such false friends!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">God keep me from false friends! but they were none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, the mayor of London comes to greet you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter the Lord Mayor and his train</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Lord Mayor</div>
                              <div class="line">God bless your grace with health and happy days!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you, good my lord; and thank you all.</div>
                              <div class="line">I thought my mother, and my brother York,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would long ere this have met us on the way</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, what a slug is Hastings, that he comes not</div>
                              <div class="line">To tell us whether they will come or no!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter HASTINGS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">And, in good time, here comes the sweating lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, my lord: what, will our mother come?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">On what occasion, God he knows, not I,</div>
                              <div class="line">The queen your mother, and your brother York,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have taken sanctuary: the tender prince</div>
                              <div class="line">Would fain have come with me to meet your grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">But by his mother was perforce withheld.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, what an indirect and peevish course</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this of hers! Lord cardinal, will your grace</div>
                              <div class="line">Persuade the queen to send the Duke of York</div>
                              <div class="line">Unto his princely brother presently?</div>
                              <div class="line">If she deny, Lord Hastings, go with him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And from her jealous arms pluck him perforce.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">My Lord of Buckingham, if my weak oratory</div>
                              <div class="line">Can from his mother win the Duke of York,</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon expect him here; but if she be obdurate</div>
                              <div class="line">To mild entreaties, God in heaven forbid</div>
                              <div class="line">We should infringe the holy privilege</div>
                              <div class="line">Of blessed sanctuary! not for all this land</div>
                              <div class="line">Would I be guilty of so deep a sin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">You are too senseless--obstinate, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Too ceremonious and traditional</div>
                              <div class="line">Weigh it but with the grossness of this age,</div>
                              <div class="line">You break not sanctuary in seizing him.</div>
                              <div class="line">The benefit thereof is always granted</div>
                              <div class="line">To those whose dealings have deserved the place,</div>
                              <div class="line">And those who have the wit to claim the place:</div>
                              <div class="line">This prince hath neither claim'd it nor deserved it;</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore, in mine opinion, cannot have it:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, taking him from thence that is not there,</div>
                              <div class="line">You break no privilege nor charter there.</div>
                              <div class="line">Oft have I heard of sanctuary men;</div>
                              <div class="line">But sanctuary children ne'er till now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CARDINAL</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, you shall o'er-rule my mind for once.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on, Lord Hastings, will you go with me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">I go, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Good lords, make all the speedy haste you may.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt CARDINAL and HASTINGS</p>
                              <div class="line">Say, uncle Gloucester, if our brother come,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where shall we sojourn till our coronation?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Where it seems best unto your royal self.</div>
                              <div class="line">If I may counsel you, some day or two</div>
                              <div class="line">Your highness shall repose you at the Tower:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then where you please, and shall be thought most fit</div>
                              <div class="line">For your best health and recreation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not like the Tower, of any place.</div>
                              <div class="line">Did Julius Caesar build that place, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">He did, my gracious lord, begin that place;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, since, succeeding ages have re-edified.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it upon record, or else reported</div>
                              <div class="line">Successively from age to age, he built it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon record, my gracious lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">But say, my lord, it were not register'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks the truth should live from age to age,</div>
                              <div class="line">As 'twere retail'd to all posterity,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even to the general all-ending day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  So wise so young, they say, do never</div>
                              <div class="line">live long.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">What say you, uncle?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, without characters, fame lives long.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">Thus, like the formal vice, Iniquity,</div>
                              <div class="line">I moralize two meanings in one word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">That Julius Caesar was a famous man;</div>
                              <div class="line">With what his valour did enrich his wit,</div>
                              <div class="line">His wit set down to make his valour live</div>
                              <div class="line">Death makes no conquest of this conqueror;</div>
                              <div class="line">For now he lives in fame, though not in life.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll tell you what, my cousin Buckingham,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">What, my gracious lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">An if I live until I be a man,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll win our ancient right in France again,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or die a soldier, as I lived a king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Short summers lightly have a forward spring.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter young YORK, HASTINGS, and the CARDINAL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, in good time, here comes the Duke of York.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Richard of York! how fares our loving brother?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, my dread lord; so must I call you now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, brother, to our grief, as it is yours:</div>
                              <div class="line">Too late he died that might have kept that title,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which by his death hath lost much majesty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">How fares our cousin, noble Lord of York?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you, gentle uncle. O, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">You said that idle weeds are fast in growth</div>
                              <div class="line">The prince my brother hath outgrown me far.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore is he idle?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">O, my fair cousin, I must not say so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Then is he more beholding to you than I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">He may command me as my sovereign;</div>
                              <div class="line">But you have power in me as in a kinsman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, uncle, give me this dagger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">My dagger, little cousin? with all my heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">A beggar, brother?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Of my kind uncle, that I know will give;</div>
                              <div class="line">And being but a toy, which is no grief to give.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">A greater gift than that I'll give my cousin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">A greater gift! O, that's the sword to it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">A gentle cousin, were it light enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">O, then, I see, you will part but with light gifts;</div>
                              <div class="line">In weightier things you'll say a beggar nay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">It is too heavy for your grace to wear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I weigh it lightly, were it heavier.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">What, would you have my weapon, little lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I would, that I might thank you as you call me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">How?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Little.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">My Lord of York will still be cross in talk:</div>
                              <div class="line">Uncle, your grace knows how to bear with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">You mean, to bear me, not to bear with me:</div>
                              <div class="line">Uncle, my brother mocks both you and me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Because that I am little, like an ape,</div>
                              <div class="line">He thinks that you should bear me on your shoulders.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">With what a sharp-provided wit he reasons!</div>
                              <div class="line">To mitigate the scorn he gives his uncle,</div>
                              <div class="line">He prettily and aptly taunts himself:</div>
                              <div class="line">So cunning and so young is wonderful.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, will't please you pass along?</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself and my good cousin Buckingham</div>
                              <div class="line">Will to your mother, to entreat of her</div>
                              <div class="line">To meet you at the Tower and welcome you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">What, will you go unto the Tower, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord protector needs will have it so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall not sleep in quiet at the Tower.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what should you fear?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, my uncle Clarence' angry ghost:</div>
                              <div class="line">My grandam told me he was murdered there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I fear no uncles dead.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor none that live, I hope.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">An if they live, I hope I need not fear.</div>
                              <div class="line">But come, my lord; and with a heavy heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thinking on them, go I unto the Tower.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>A Sennet. Exeunt all but GLOUCESTER, BUCKINGHAM
and CATESBY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Think you, my lord, this little prating York</div>
                              <div class="line">Was not incensed by his subtle mother</div>
                              <div class="line">To taunt and scorn you thus opprobriously?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">No doubt, no doubt; O, 'tis a parlous boy;</div>
                              <div class="line">Bold, quick, ingenious, forward, capable</div>
                              <div class="line">He is all the mother's, from the top to toe.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, let them rest. Come hither, Catesby.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art sworn as deeply to effect what we intend</div>
                              <div class="line">As closely to conceal what we impart:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou know'st our reasons urged upon the way;</div>
                              <div class="line">What think'st thou? is it not an easy matter</div>
                              <div class="line">To make William Lord Hastings of our mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">For the instalment of this noble duke</div>
                              <div class="line">In the seat royal of this famous isle?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">He for his father's sake so loves the prince,</div>
                              <div class="line">That he will not be won to aught against him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">What think'st thou, then, of Stanley? what will he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">He will do all in all as Hastings doth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, then, no more but this: go, gentle Catesby,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, as it were far off sound thou Lord Hastings,</div>
                              <div class="line">How doth he stand affected to our purpose;</div>
                              <div class="line">And summon him to-morrow to the Tower,</div>
                              <div class="line">To sit about the coronation.</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou dost find him tractable to us,</div>
                              <div class="line">Encourage him, and show him all our reasons:</div>
                              <div class="line">If he be leaden, icy-cold, unwilling,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be thou so too; and so break off your talk,</div>
                              <div class="line">And give us notice of his inclination:</div>
                              <div class="line">For we to-morrow hold divided councils,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein thyself shalt highly be employ'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Commend me to Lord William: tell him, Catesby,</div>
                              <div class="line">His ancient knot of dangerous adversaries</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow are let blood at Pomfret-castle;</div>
                              <div class="line">And bid my friend, for joy of this good news,</div>
                              <div class="line">Give mistress Shore one gentle kiss the more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Catesby, go, effect this business soundly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">My good lords both, with all the heed I may.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall we hear from you, Catesby, ere we sleep?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">At Crosby Place, there shall you find us both.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit CATESBY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, my lord, what shall we do, if we perceive</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Hastings will not yield to our complots?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Chop off his head, man; somewhat we will do:</div>
                              <div class="line">And, look, when I am king, claim thou of me</div>
                              <div class="line">The earldom of Hereford, and the moveables</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereof the king my brother stood possess'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BUCKINGHAM</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll claim that promise at your grace's hands.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">And look to have it yielded with all willingness.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, let us sup betimes, that afterwards</div>
                              <div class="line">We may digest our complots in some form.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Before Lord Hastings' house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">What, ho! my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Who knocks at the door?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">A messenger from the Lord Stanley.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter HASTINGS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">What is't o'clock?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the stroke of four.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot thy master sleep these tedious nights?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">So it should seem by that I have to say.</div>
                              <div class="line">First, he commends him to your noble lordship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">And then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">And then he sends you word</div>
                              <div class="line">He dreamt to-night the boar had razed his helm:</div>
                              <div class="line">Besides, he says there are two councils held;</div>
                              <div class="line">And that may be determined at the one</div>
                              <div class="line">which may make you and him to rue at the other.</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore he sends to know your lordship's pleasure,</div>
                              <div class="line">If presently you will take horse with him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And with all speed post with him toward the north,</div>
                              <div class="line">To shun the danger that his soul divines.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, fellow, go, return unto thy lord;</div>
                              <div class="line">Bid him not fear the separated councils</div>
                              <div class="line">His honour and myself are at the one,</div>
                              <div class="line">And at the other is my servant Catesby</div>
                              <div class="line">Where nothing can proceed that toucheth us</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereof I shall not have intelligence.</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell him his fears are shallow, wanting instance:</div>
                              <div class="line">And for his dreams, I wonder he is so fond</div>
                              <div class="line">To trust the mockery of unquiet slumbers</div>
                              <div class="line">To fly the boar before the boar pursues,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were to incense the boar to follow us</div>
                              <div class="line">And make pursuit where he did mean no chase.</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, bid thy master rise and come to me</div>
                              <div class="line">And we will both together to the Tower,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where, he shall see, the boar will use us kindly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">My gracious lord, I'll tell him what you say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter CATESBY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">Many good morrows to my noble lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, Catesby; you are early stirring</div>
                              <div class="line">What news, what news, in this our tottering state?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a reeling world, indeed, my lord;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I believe twill never stand upright</div>
                              <div class="line">Tim Richard wear the garland of the realm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">How! wear the garland! dost thou mean the crown?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll have this crown of mine cut from my shoulders</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere I will see the crown so foul misplaced.</div>
                              <div class="line">But canst thou guess that he doth aim at it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, on my life; and hopes to find forward</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon his party for the gain thereof:</div>
                              <div class="line">And thereupon he sends you this good news,</div>
                              <div class="line">That this same very day your enemies,</div>
                              <div class="line">The kindred of the queen, must die at Pomfret.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, I am no mourner for that news,</div>
                              <div class="line">Because they have been still mine enemies:</div>
                              <div class="line">But, that I'll give my voice on Richard's side,</div>
                              <div class="line">To bar my master's heirs in true descent,</div>
                              <div class="line">God knows I will not do it, to the death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">God keep your lordship in that gracious mind!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">But I shall laugh at this a twelve-month hence,</div>
                              <div class="line">That they who brought me in my master's hate</div>
                              <div class="line">I live to look upon their tragedy.</div>
                              <div class="line">I tell thee, Catesby--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">What, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere a fortnight make me elder,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll send some packing that yet think not on it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis a vile thing to die, my gracious lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">When men are unprepared and look not for it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">O monstrous, monstrous! and so falls it out</div>
                              <div class="line">With Rivers, Vaughan, Grey: and so 'twill do</div>
                              <div class="line">With some men else, who think themselves as safe</div>
                              <div class="line">As thou and I; who, as thou know'st, are dear</div>
                              <div class="line">To princely Richard and to Buckingham.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">The princes both make high account of you;</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">For they account his head upon the bridge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">I know they do; and I have well deserved it.</div>
                              <p>Enter STANLEY</p>
                              <div class="line">Come on, come on; where is your boar-spear, man?</div>
                              <div class="line">Fear you the boar, and go so unprovided?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, good morrow; good morrow, Catesby:</div>
                              <div class="line">You may jest on, but, by the holy rood,</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not like these several councils, I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">I hold my life as dear as you do yours;</div>
                              <div class="line">And never in my life, I do protest,</div>
                              <div class="line">Was it more precious to me than 'tis now:</div>
                              <div class="line">Think you, but that I know our state secure,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would be so triumphant as I am?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">The lords at Pomfret, when they rode from London,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were jocund, and supposed their state was sure,</div>
                              <div class="line">And they indeed had no cause to mistrust;</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet, you see how soon the day o'ercast.</div>
                              <div class="line">This sudden stag of rancour I misdoubt:</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray God, I say, I prove a needless coward!</div>
                              <div class="line">What, shall we toward the Tower? the day is spent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, have with you. Wot you what, my lord?</div>
                              <div class="line">To-day the lords you talk of are beheaded.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">They, for their truth, might better wear their heads</div>
                              <div class="line">Than some that have accused them wear their hats.</div>
                              <div class="line">But come, my lord, let us away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Pursuivant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go on before; I'll talk with this good fellow.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt STANLEY and CATESBY</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, sirrah! how goes the world with thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pursuivant</div>
                              <div class="line">The better that your lordship please to ask.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
                              <div class="line">I tell thee, man, 'tis better with me now</div>
                              <div class="line">Than when I met thee last where now we meet:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then was I going prisoner to the Tower,</div>
                              <div class="line">By the suggestion of the queen's allies;</div>
                              <div class="line">But now, I tell thee--keep it to thyself--</div>
                              <div class="line">This day those enemies are put to death,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I in better state than e'er I was.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pursuivant</div>
                              <div class="line">God hold it, to your honour's good content!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HASTINGS</div>
