                              <div class="line">The slaughter of the prince that owed that crown,</div>
                              <div class="line">And the dire death of my two sons and brothers?</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, thou villain slave, where are my children?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou toad, thou toad, where is thy brother Clarence?</div>
                              <div class="line">And little Ned Plantagenet, his son?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is kind Hastings, Rivers, Vaughan, Grey?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">A flourish, trumpets! strike alarum, drums!</div>
                              <div class="line">Let not the heavens hear these tell-tale women</div>
                              <div class="line">Rail on the Lord's enointed: strike, I say!</div>
                              <p>Flourish. Alarums</p>
                              <div class="line">Either be patient, and entreat me fair,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or with the clamorous report of war</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus will I drown your exclamations.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Art thou my son?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, I thank God, my father, and yourself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Then patiently hear my impatience.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, I have a touch of your condition,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which cannot brook the accent of reproof.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">O, let me speak!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Do then: but I'll not hear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be mild and gentle in my speech.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">And brief, good mother; for I am in haste.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Art thou so hasty? I have stay'd for thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">God knows, in anguish, pain and agony.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">And came I not at last to comfort you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">No, by the holy rood, thou know'st it well,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou camest on earth to make the earth my hell.</div>
                              <div class="line">A grievous burthen was thy birth to me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Tetchy and wayward was thy infancy;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy school-days frightful, desperate, wild, and furious,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy prime of manhood daring, bold, and venturous,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy age confirm'd, proud, subdued, bloody,</div>
                              <div class="line">treacherous,</div>
                              <div class="line">More mild, but yet more harmful, kind in hatred:</div>
                              <div class="line">What comfortable hour canst thou name,</div>
                              <div class="line">That ever graced me in thy company?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, none, but Humphrey Hour, that call'd</div>
                              <div class="line">your grace</div>
                              <div class="line">To breakfast once forth of my company.</div>
                              <div class="line">If I be so disgracious in your sight,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me march on, and not offend your grace.</div>
                              <div class="line">Strike the drum.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, hear me speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">You speak too bitterly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me a word;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I shall never speak to thee again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">So.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUCHESS OF YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Either thou wilt die, by God's just ordinance,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere from this war thou turn a conqueror,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or I with grief and extreme age shall perish</div>
                              <div class="line">And never look upon thy face again.</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore take with thee my most heavy curse;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, in the day of battle, tire thee more</div>
                              <div class="line">Than all the complete armour that thou wear'st!</div>
                              <div class="line">My prayers on the adverse party fight;</div>
                              <div class="line">And there the little souls of Edward's children</div>
                              <div class="line">Whisper the spirits of thine enemies</div>
                              <div class="line">And promise them success and victory.</div>
                              <div class="line">Bloody thou art, bloody will be thy end;</div>
                              <div class="line">Shame serves thy life and doth thy death attend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Though far more cause, yet much less spirit to curse</div>
                              <div class="line">Abides in me; I say amen to all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Stay, madam; I must speak a word with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I have no more sons of the royal blood</div>
                              <div class="line">For thee to murder: for my daughters, Richard,</div>
                              <div class="line">They shall be praying nuns, not weeping queens;</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore level not to hit their lives.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">You have a daughter call'd Elizabeth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Virtuous and fair, royal and gracious.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">And must she die for this? O, let her live,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I'll corrupt her manners, stain her beauty;</div>
                              <div class="line">Slander myself as false to Edward's bed;</div>
                              <div class="line">Throw over her the veil of infamy:</div>
                              <div class="line">So she may live unscarr'd of bleeding slaughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will confess she was not Edward's daughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Wrong not her birth, she is of royal blood.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">To save her life, I'll say she is not so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Her life is only safest in her birth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">And only in that safety died her brothers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Lo, at their births good stars were opposite.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">No, to their lives bad friends were contrary.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">All unavoided is the doom of destiny.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">True, when avoided grace makes destiny:</div>
                              <div class="line">My babes were destined to a fairer death,</div>
                              <div class="line">If grace had bless'd thee with a fairer life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">You speak as if that I had slain my cousins.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Cousins, indeed; and by their uncle cozen'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Of comfort, kingdom, kindred, freedom, life.</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose hand soever lanced their tender hearts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy head, all indirectly, gave direction:</div>
                              <div class="line">No doubt the murderous knife was dull and blunt</div>
                              <div class="line">Till it was whetted on thy stone-hard heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">To revel in the entrails of my lambs.</div>
                              <div class="line">But that still use of grief makes wild grief tame,</div>
                              <div class="line">My tongue should to thy ears not name my boys</div>
                              <div class="line">Till that my nails were anchor'd in thine eyes;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I, in such a desperate bay of death,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like a poor bark, of sails and tackling reft,</div>
                              <div class="line">Rush all to pieces on thy rocky bosom.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, so thrive I in my enterprise</div>
                              <div class="line">And dangerous success of bloody wars,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I intend more good to you and yours,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than ever you or yours were by me wrong'd!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">What good is cover'd with the face of heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">To be discover'd, that can do me good?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">The advancement of your children, gentle lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Up to some scaffold, there to lose their heads?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">No, to the dignity and height of honour</div>
                              <div class="line">The high imperial type of this earth's glory.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Flatter my sorrows with report of it;</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me what state, what dignity, what honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">Canst thou demise to any child of mine?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Even all I have; yea, and myself and all,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will I withal endow a child of thine;</div>
                              <div class="line">So in the Lethe of thy angry soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou drown the sad remembrance of those wrongs</div>
                              <div class="line">Which thou supposest I have done to thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Be brief, lest that be process of thy kindness</div>
                              <div class="line">Last longer telling than thy kindness' date.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Then know, that from my soul I love thy daughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">My daughter's mother thinks it with her soul.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">What do you think?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou dost love my daughter from thy soul:</div>
                              <div class="line">So from thy soul's love didst thou love her brothers;</div>
                              <div class="line">And from my heart's love I do thank thee for it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not so hasty to confound my meaning:</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean, that with my soul I love thy daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">And mean to make her queen of England.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Say then, who dost thou mean shall be her king?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Even he that makes her queen who should be else?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">What, thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">I, even I: what think you of it, madam?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">How canst thou woo her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">That would I learn of you,</div>
                              <div class="line">As one that are best acquainted with her humour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">And wilt thou learn of me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, with all my heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Send to her, by the man that slew her brothers,</div>
                              <div class="line">A pair of bleeding-hearts; thereon engrave</div>
                              <div class="line">Edward and York; then haply she will weep:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore present to her--as sometime Margaret</div>
                              <div class="line">Did to thy father, steep'd in Rutland's blood,--</div>
                              <div class="line">A handkerchief; which, say to her, did drain</div>
                              <div class="line">The purple sap from her sweet brother's body</div>
                              <div class="line">And bid her dry her weeping eyes therewith.</div>
                              <div class="line">If this inducement force her not to love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Send her a story of thy noble acts;</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell her thou madest away her uncle Clarence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her uncle Rivers; yea, and, for her sake,</div>
                              <div class="line">Madest quick conveyance with her good aunt Anne.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, you mock me; this is not the way</div>
                              <div class="line">To win our daughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">There is no other way</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless thou couldst put on some other shape,</div>
                              <div class="line">And not be Richard that hath done all this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Say that I did all this for love of her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, then indeed she cannot choose but hate thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Having bought love with such a bloody spoil.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, what is done cannot be now amended:</div>
                              <div class="line">Men shall deal unadvisedly sometimes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which after hours give leisure to repent.</div>
                              <div class="line">If I did take the kingdom from your sons,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make amends, Ill give it to your daughter.</div>
                              <div class="line">If I have kill'd the issue of your womb,</div>
                              <div class="line">To quicken your increase, I will beget</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine issue of your blood upon your daughter</div>
                              <div class="line">A grandam's name is little less in love</div>
                              <div class="line">Than is the doting title of a mother;</div>
                              <div class="line">They are as children but one step below,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even of your mettle, of your very blood;</div>
                              <div class="line">Of an one pain, save for a night of groans</div>
                              <div class="line">Endured of her, for whom you bid like sorrow.</div>
                              <div class="line">Your children were vexation to your youth,</div>
                              <div class="line">But mine shall be a comfort to your age.</div>
                              <div class="line">The loss you have is but a son being king,</div>
                              <div class="line">And by that loss your daughter is made queen.</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot make you what amends I would,</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore accept such kindness as I can.</div>
                              <div class="line">Dorset your son, that with a fearful soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Leads discontented steps in foreign soil,</div>
                              <div class="line">This fair alliance quickly shall call home</div>
                              <div class="line">To high promotions and great dignity:</div>
                              <div class="line">The king, that calls your beauteous daughter wife.</div>
                              <div class="line">Familiarly shall call thy Dorset brother;</div>
                              <div class="line">Again shall you be mother to a king,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all the ruins of distressful times</div>
                              <div class="line">Repair'd with double riches of content.</div>
                              <div class="line">What! we have many goodly days to see:</div>
                              <div class="line">The liquid drops of tears that you have shed</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall come again, transform'd to orient pearl,</div>
                              <div class="line">Advantaging their loan with interest</div>
                              <div class="line">Of ten times double gain of happiness.</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, then my mother, to thy daughter go</div>
                              <div class="line">Make bold her bashful years with your experience;</div>
                              <div class="line">Prepare her ears to hear a wooer's tale</div>
                              <div class="line">Put in her tender heart the aspiring flame</div>
                              <div class="line">Of golden sovereignty; acquaint the princess</div>
                              <div class="line">With the sweet silent hours of marriage joys</div>
                              <div class="line">And when this arm of mine hath chastised</div>
                              <div class="line">The petty rebel, dull-brain'd Buckingham,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bound with triumphant garlands will I come</div>
                              <div class="line">And lead thy daughter to a conqueror's bed;</div>
                              <div class="line">To whom I will retail my conquest won,</div>
                              <div class="line">And she shall be sole victress, Caesar's Caesar.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">What were I best to say? her father's brother</div>
                              <div class="line">Would be her lord? or shall I say, her uncle?</div>
                              <div class="line">Or, he that slew her brothers and her uncles?</div>
                              <div class="line">Under what title shall I woo for thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">That God, the law, my honour and her love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Can make seem pleasing to her tender years?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Infer fair England's peace by this alliance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Which she shall purchase with still lasting war.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Say that the king, which may command, entreats.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">That at her hands which the king's King forbids.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, she shall be a high and mighty queen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">To wail the tide, as her mother doth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, I will love her everlastingly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">But how long shall that title 'ever' last?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweetly in force unto her fair life's end.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">But how long fairly shall her sweet lie last?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">So long as heaven and nature lengthens it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">So long as hell and Richard likes of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, I, her sovereign, am her subject love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">But she, your subject, loathes such sovereignty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Be eloquent in my behalf to her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">An honest tale speeds best being plainly told.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Then in plain terms tell her my loving tale.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Plain and not honest is too harsh a style.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Your reasons are too shallow and too quick.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">O no, my reasons are too deep and dead;</div>
                              <div class="line">Too deep and dead, poor infants, in their grave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Harp not on that string, madam; that is past.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Harp on it still shall I till heart-strings break.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, by my George, my garter, and my crown,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Profaned, dishonour'd, and the third usurp'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">I swear--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">By nothing; for this is no oath:</div>
                              <div class="line">The George, profaned, hath lost his holy honour;</div>
                              <div class="line">The garter, blemish'd, pawn'd his knightly virtue;</div>
                              <div class="line">The crown, usurp'd, disgraced his kingly glory.</div>
                              <div class="line">if something thou wilt swear to be believed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Swear then by something that thou hast not wrong'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, by the world--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis full of thy foul wrongs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">My father's death--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy life hath that dishonour'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, by myself--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Thyself thyself misusest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Why then, by God--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">God's wrong is most of all.</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou hadst fear'd to break an oath by Him,</div>
                              <div class="line">The unity the king thy brother made</div>
                              <div class="line">Had not been broken, nor my brother slain:</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou hadst fear'd to break an oath by Him,</div>
                              <div class="line">The imperial metal, circling now thy brow,</div>
                              <div class="line">Had graced the tender temples of my child,</div>
                              <div class="line">And both the princes had been breathing here,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which now, two tender playfellows to dust,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy broken faith hath made a prey for worms.</div>
                              <div class="line">What canst thou swear by now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">The time to come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou hast wronged in the time o'erpast;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I myself have many tears to wash</div>
                              <div class="line">Hereafter time, for time past wrong'd by thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">The children live, whose parents thou hast</div>
                              <div class="line">slaughter'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ungovern'd youth, to wail it in their age;</div>
                              <div class="line">The parents live, whose children thou hast butcher'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Old wither'd plants, to wail it with their age.</div>
                              <div class="line">Swear not by time to come; for that thou hast</div>
                              <div class="line">Misused ere used, by time misused o'erpast.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">As I intend to prosper and repent,</div>
                              <div class="line">So thrive I in my dangerous attempt</div>
                              <div class="line">Of hostile arms! myself myself confound!</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven and fortune bar me happy hours!</div>
                              <div class="line">Day, yield me not thy light; nor, night, thy rest!</div>
                              <div class="line">Be opposite all planets of good luck</div>
                              <div class="line">To my proceedings, if, with pure heart's love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Immaculate devotion, holy thoughts,</div>
                              <div class="line">I tender not thy beauteous princely daughter!</div>
                              <div class="line">In her consists my happiness and thine;</div>
                              <div class="line">Without her, follows to this land and me,</div>
                              <div class="line">To thee, herself, and many a Christian soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">Death, desolation, ruin and decay:</div>
                              <div class="line">It cannot be avoided but by this;</div>
                              <div class="line">It will not be avoided but by this.</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore, good mother,--I must can you so--</div>
                              <div class="line">Be the attorney of my love to her:</div>
                              <div class="line">Plead what I will be, not what I have been;</div>
                              <div class="line">Not my deserts, but what I will deserve:</div>
                              <div class="line">Urge the necessity and state of times,</div>
                              <div class="line">And be not peevish-fond in great designs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I be tempted of the devil thus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, if the devil tempt thee to do good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I forget myself to be myself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, if yourself's remembrance wrong yourself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">But thou didst kill my children.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">But in your daughter's womb I bury them:</div>
                              <div class="line">Where in that nest of spicery they shall breed</div>
                              <div class="line">Selves of themselves, to your recomforture.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I go win my daughter to thy will?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">And be a happy mother by the deed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                              <div class="line">I go. Write to me very shortly.</div>
                              <div class="line">And you shall understand from me her mind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Bear her my true love's kiss; and so, farewell.</div>
                              <p>Exit QUEEN ELIZABETH</p>
                              <div class="line">Relenting fool, and shallow, changing woman!</div>
                              <p>Enter RATCLIFF; CATESBY following</p>
                              <div class="line">How now! what news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RATCLIFF</div>
                              <div class="line">My gracious sovereign, on the western coast</div>
                              <div class="line">Rideth a puissant navy; to the shore</div>
                              <div class="line">Throng many doubtful hollow-hearted friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unarm'd, and unresolved to beat them back:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis thought that Richmond is their admiral;</div>
                              <div class="line">And there they hull, expecting but the aid</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Buckingham to welcome them ashore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Some light-foot friend post to the Duke of Norfolk:</div>
                              <div class="line">Ratcliff, thyself, or Catesby; where is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Fly to the duke:</div>
                              <p>To RATCLIFF</p>
                              <div class="line">Post thou to Salisbury</div>
                              <div class="line">When thou comest thither--</div>
                              <p>To CATESBY</p>
                              <div class="line">Dull, unmindful villain,</div>
                              <div class="line">Why stand'st thou still, and go'st not to the duke?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">First, mighty sovereign, let me know your mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">What from your grace I shall deliver to him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">O, true, good Catesby: bid him levy straight</div>
                              <div class="line">The greatest strength and power he can make,</div>
                              <div class="line">And meet me presently at Salisbury.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">I go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RATCLIFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What is't your highness' pleasure I shall do at</div>
                              <div class="line">Salisbury?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what wouldst thou do there before I go?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RATCLIFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Your highness told me I should post before.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">My mind is changed, sir, my mind is changed.</div>
                              <p>Enter STANLEY</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, what news with you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">None good, my lord, to please you with the hearing;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor none so bad, but it may well be told.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Hoyday, a riddle! neither good nor bad!</div>
                              <div class="line">Why dost thou run so many mile about,</div>
                              <div class="line">When thou mayst tell thy tale a nearer way?</div>
                              <div class="line">Once more, what news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Richmond is on the seas.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">There let him sink, and be the seas on him!</div>
                              <div class="line">White-liver'd runagate, what doth he there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not, mighty sovereign, but by guess.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, as you guess, as you guess?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Stirr'd up by Dorset, Buckingham, and Ely,</div>
                              <div class="line">He makes for England, there to claim the crown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Is the chair empty? is the sword unsway'd?</div>
                              <div class="line">Is the king dead? the empire unpossess'd?</div>
                              <div class="line">What heir of York is there alive but we?</div>
                              <div class="line">And who is England's king but great York's heir?</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, tell me, what doth he upon the sea?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless for that, my liege, I cannot guess.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless for that he comes to be your liege,</div>
                              <div class="line">You cannot guess wherefore the Welshman comes.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wilt revolt, and fly to him, I fear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">No, mighty liege; therefore mistrust me not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is thy power, then, to beat him back?</div>
                              <div class="line">Where are thy tenants and thy followers?</div>
                              <div class="line">Are they not now upon the western shore.</div>
                              <div class="line">Safe-conducting the rebels from their ships!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">No, my good lord, my friends are in the north.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Cold friends to Richard: what do they in the north,</div>
                              <div class="line">When they should serve their sovereign in the west?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">They have not been commanded, mighty sovereign:</div>
                              <div class="line">Please it your majesty to give me leave,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll muster up my friends, and meet your grace</div>
                              <div class="line">Where and what time your majesty shall please.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, ay. thou wouldst be gone to join with Richmond:</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not trust you, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Most mighty sovereign,</div>
                              <div class="line">You have no cause to hold my friendship doubtful:</div>
                              <div class="line">I never was nor never will be false.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Well,</div>
                              <div class="line">Go muster men; but, hear you, leave behind</div>
                              <div class="line">Your son, George Stanley: look your faith be firm.</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else his head's assurance is but frail.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STANLEY</div>
                              <div class="line">So deal with him as I prove true to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">My gracious sovereign, now in Devonshire,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I by friends am well advertised,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Edward Courtney, and the haughty prelate</div>
                              <div class="line">Bishop of Exeter, his brother there,</div>
                              <div class="line">With many more confederates, are in arms.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter another Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">My liege, in Kent the Guildfords are in arms;</div>
                              <div class="line">And every hour more competitors</div>
                              <div class="line">Flock to their aid, and still their power increaseth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter another Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, the army of the Duke of Buckingham--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Out on you, owls! nothing but songs of death?</div>
                              <p>He striketh him</p>
                              <div class="line">Take that, until thou bring me better news.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">The news I have to tell your majesty</div>
                              <div class="line">Is, that by sudden floods and fall of waters,</div>
                              <div class="line">Buckingham's army is dispersed and scatter'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">And he himself wander'd away alone,</div>
                              <div class="line">No man knows whither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">I cry thee mercy:</div>
                              <div class="line">There is my purse to cure that blow of thine.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath any well-advised friend proclaim'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Reward to him that brings the traitor in?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Such proclamation hath been made, my liege.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter another Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fourth Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Thomas Lovel and Lord Marquis Dorset,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis said, my liege, in Yorkshire are in arms.</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet this good comfort bring I to your grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">The Breton navy is dispersed by tempest:</div>
                              <div class="line">Richmond, in Yorkshire, sent out a boat</div>
                              <div class="line">Unto the shore, to ask those on the banks</div>
                              <div class="line">If they were his assistants, yea or no;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who answer'd him, they came from Buckingham.</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon his party: he, mistrusting them,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hoisted sail and made away for Brittany.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">March on, march on, since we are up in arms;</div>
                              <div class="line">If not to fight with foreign enemies,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet to beat down these rebels here at home.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter CATESBY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CATESBY</div>
                              <div class="line">My liege, the Duke of Buckingham is taken;</div>
                              <div class="line">That is the best news: that the Earl of Richmond</div>
                              <div class="line">Is with a mighty power landed at Milford,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is colder tidings, yet they must be told.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING RICHARD III</div>
                              <div class="line">Away towards Salisbury! while we reason here,</div>
                              <div class="line">A royal battle might be won and lost</div>
                              <div class="line">Some one take order Buckingham be brought</div>
                              <div class="line">To Salisbury; the rest march on with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Flourish. Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  Lord Derby's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DERBY and SIR CHRISTOPHER URSWICK</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DERBY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Christopher, tell Richmond this from me:</div>
                              <div class="line">That in the sty of this most bloody boar</div>
                              <div class="line">My son George Stanley is frank'd up in hold:</div>
                              <div class="line">If I revolt, off goes young George's head;</div>
                              <div class="line">The fear of that withholds my present aid.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, tell me, where is princely Richmond now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CHRISTOPHER</div>
                              <div class="line">At Pembroke, or at Harford-west, in Wales.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DERBY</div>
                              <div class="line">What men of name resort to him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CHRISTOPHER</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Walter Herbert, a renowned soldier;</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Gilbert Talbot, Sir William Stanley;</div>
                              <div class="line">Oxford, redoubted Pembroke, Sir James Blunt,</div>
                              <div class="line">And Rice ap Thomas with a valiant crew;</div>
                              <div class="line">And many more of noble fame and worth:</div>
                              <div class="line">And towards London they do bend their course,</div>
                              <div class="line">If by the way they be not fought withal.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DERBY</div>
                              <div class="line">Return unto thy lord; commend me to him:</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell him the queen hath heartily consented</div>
                              <div class="line">He shall espouse Elizabeth her daughter.</div>
                              <div class="line">These letters will resolve him of my mind. Farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
